snippet: Johnny Gandelsman’s show at Bargemusic bore the fruits of a 2013 performance of the Chaconne from the second Partita, which he played on gut strings with a Baroque bow.
lead_paragraph: Johnny Gandelsman’s show at Bargemusic bore the fruits of a 2013 performance of the Chaconne from the second Partita, which he played on gut strings with a Baroque bow.

headline.print_headline: Deviating From the Modern, to Fresh Effect
headline.seo: Johnny Gandelsman Performs Bach Violin Works at Bargemusic
headline.main: Deviating From the Modern, to Fresh Effect
